description:
Serving DuPage and Kane counties and the surrounding areas from our law office in St. Charles, Illinois, the experienced, dedicated and responsive attorneys at Klein, Daday, Aretos & O'Donoghue, LLC, are fully committed to doing whatever we can to help you resolve your conflicts and disputes and achieve the positive results you seek for all of the serious and pressing legal matters affecting virtually every aspect of your life, your company and your future.

Backed by our decades of combined legal experience, our law firm's attorneys commonly collaborate on the cases we handle so that we can leverage our respective strengths to help our clients find the solutions they need for their legal matters as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

Since we first opened our doors in 1985, we have become one of the region's top full-service law firms, with five total offices throughout the greater Chicago metro area and southern Wisconsin. This success is the direct result of our exceptional customer service and our impeccable professionalism as well as our creativity and unwavering focus on the needs of those we serve.

No matter how complex or challenging your situation, you can find the practical solutions and value-added support you deserve for your legal issues involving criminal defense, family law, real estate law, corporate law, banking and finance, condominium and association law, bankruptcy, estate planning and more.

For more information on the services we offer and to schedule a consultation with one of our attorneys regarding the legal matters you need to address, you can contact Klein, Daday, Aretos & O'Donoghue, LLC, by phone, email or through the online form located on our law firm's website.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
